H0.text: In Leonardo’s painting, what is Judas seen to spill as a symbol of his treachery. Wine

H1.text: In Leonardo’s painting, what is Judas seen to spill as a symbol of his treachery. Bread

H2.text: In Leonardo’s painting, what is Judas seen to spill as a symbol of his treachery. Oil

H3.text: In Leonardo’s painting, what is Judas seen to spill as a symbol of his treachery. Salt

A4.text: He is also tipping over the salt cellar, which may be related to the near-Eastern expression to 'betray the salt' meaning to betray one's master.
